item.description:
******  FIELD TRIP  *****************************

If I'm not mistaken this is being hosted by the owner(s) of the Tremont Tea Room (which is right across the street). Lets figure out where to meet and carpool.

From Alex:

Midsomer/Litha/Solstice Ritual Circle - outdoors Boston Common
    Posted by: "alex p" fablush@comcast.net alexpale
   
Time Tuesday, June 21 · 8:30pm - 11:30pm
Location Parkman Bandstand Boston Common

The Boston Commons Pagan Alliance Presents
Midsomer/Litha/Solstice Ritual Circle - outdoors Boston Common
Join us for a very special and dramtic circle/ritual/performance.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parkman_Bandstand
 
We are an open group of pagans made of mostly solitary or somewhat solitary practitioners. But we tend to want to be around like-minded people with whom we can share our experiences and knowledge (and we can learn from them as well). We pride ourselves on being a not too overly organized organization and welcome pagans of all backgrounds, traditions and beliefs, right now our recognized leaders are probably more Wiccan than other trads but we open to all ... We identify more with being eclectic pagan coven with very strong Wiccan influences.....but how that grows and changes is up to each and everyone that attends our circles. We welcome all pagan influences to our collective higher consciousness.
item.name: Midsummer Solstice Ritual Circle
